name: Backrooms Break
description:
Backrooms Break, my entry for Ludum Dare 51

  • The monster follows you in a fully procedurally generated labyrinth
  • It gets your position every 10 seconds, wherever you are, so keep moving
  • When it sees you directly it disregards the timer and comes at you
  • You need to manage your willpower and flashlight battery, both decrease every 10 seconds
  • If you run out of willpower, you won’t be able to move or attack
  • Only the rooms are lighted up, corridors are dark
  • Find loot boxes behind breakable walls and in offices (almost everything is breakable :))
  • Lootboxes contain coffee (sustain willpower) or batteries (power up your flashlight for dark corridors)
  • Reach the exit to win the game

Requirements

- at least 16 GB RAM, otherwise the labyrinth generator may crash
